Sentencas: Solid electrolyte ceramics consisted of ceria, yttria and zinc oxide has been synthesized through solid state reaction.
Titulo: Effect of zinc oxide on yttria doped ceria

Sentencas: With the zinc oxide content over 0.4 mol.%, this material is able to achieve a relative density of 96% at 1375 degrees C, about 200 degrees C lower than that without zinc oxide.
Titulo: Effect of zinc oxide on yttria doped ceria

Sentencas: The result of XRD reveals that the lattice parameter increased with the concentration of zinc oxide up to 0.6 mol%, suggesting its solubility limit for fluorite structure of ceria.
Titulo: Effect of zinc oxide on yttria doped ceria

Sentencas: It is also found that this doping level is coincident with that where it has the highest ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of zinc oxide on yttria doped ceria

Sentencas: Furthermore, it is detected by EDS that the excess zinc oxide tends to agglomerate and locate on the surface of sintered sample when the addition exceeds the solubility limit.
Titulo: Effect of zinc oxide on yttria doped ceria
